title: 72/125. Observer status for the International Network for Bamboo and Rattan in the General Assembly
text:
United Nations 
A/RES/72/125
 
 
General Assembly 
Distr.: General 
18 December 2017 
 
17-22170 (E)    201217  
*1722170* 
 
 
Seventy-second session 
Agenda item 170 
 
 
 
 
 Resolution adopted by the General Assembly 
on 7 December 2017 
 
 
 
 
[on the report of the Sixth Committee (A/72/473)] 
 
 
 72/125. Observer status for the International Network for Bamboo 
and Rattan in the General Assembly 
 
 
 
The General Assembly, 
 
Wishing to promote cooperation between the United Nations and the 
International Network for Bamboo and Rattan, 
 
1. 
Decides to invite the International Network for Bamboo and Rattan to 
participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of 
observer; 
 
2. 
Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement 
the present resolution. 
 
67th plenary meeting  
7 December 2017

paragraphs.1: Decides to invite the International Network for Bamboo and Rattan to participate in the sessions and the work of the General Assembly in the capacity of observer;
paragraphs.2: Requests the Secretary-General to take the action necessary to implement the present resolution.
